text: "Lost in You" is a song by German recording artist Lena Meyer-Landrut. It was released on 14 April 2017 as a single. The song was written by Meyer-Landrut, Vincent Stein, Konstantin Scherer, Wim Treuner and Nico Wellenbrink. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format(s) ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Germany | 14 April 2017 | Digital download | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 songs Category:2017 singles Category:Lena Meyer-Landrut songs Category:Universal Music Group singles Category:Songs written by Vincent Stein Category:Songs written by Nico Santos (singer) Category:Songs written by Lena Meyer-Landrut
title: Lost in You (Lena Meyer-Landrut song)
